蟙字的基本解释

蟙
zhí
〔蟙??（
高脚蟹，最大的节肢动物，头胸甲呈梨形，长可达三十多厘米，螯足长一米多，是最大的蟹，可供食用。m?）〕蝙蝠。

蟙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhí］
［《廣韻》之翼切，入職，章。］
(1)见“蟙”。
(2)蟹的一种。

蟙字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟙； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1096第37
【唐韻】之翼切【集韻】質力切，?音職。蟲名。【爾雅·蝙蝠註】齊人謂之蟙䘃，或謂之仙䑕。　又【本草】蟹殻闊而多黃者名蟙。　或作?。

蟙字的源字形

蟙字的起名意思

暂无。

Xuan
Basic explanation of words
Xuan
zhí
〔蟙?? (
The tall crab, the largest arthropod, has a pear-shaped head and breast carapace, which can grow up to more than 30 centimeters in length, and its chelated feet are more than one meter long. It is the largest crab and can be eaten. m?)] Bat.
Xuan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhí］
["Guangyun" wing cut, entry, chapter. ]
(1) See "蟙".
(2) A kind of crab.
Xuan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蟙; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1096 Page 37
[Tang Yun] Wing Cut [Ji Yun] Quality cut, sound job. Insect name. [Erya·Bat's Note] The Qi people are called "Xian Pei" or "Xian Pei".　[Materia Medica] Crabs with broad and yellow shells are named 蟙.　Or make?.
